alert.note: Alert for City of Franklin; City of Suffolk; Isle of Wight; Southampton (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 1:06PM EDT until May 16 at 1:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN ISLE OF WIGHT...AND EAST CENTRAL SOUTHAMPTON COUNTIES...THE CITY OF FRANKLIN AND THE WEST CENTRAL CITY OF SUFFOLK... At 106 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hunterdale, or near Franklin, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Carrsville around 115 PM EDT. Windsor and Zuni around 125 PM EDT. Suffolk around 155 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Walters, Collosse, Boaz, Burdette, Lees Mill and Story. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: City of Franklin; City of Suffolk; Isle of Wight; Southampton
